Articles.Content:
Rules

Everyone must use KSP 1.10 or 1.11

Everyone can claim 1 PARTS mod to use(other than NFT/FFT)

EVERYONE gets NFT(all parts) and this mod cannot be claimed

Once a certain point has been reached FFT can be installed BY ANYONE

EVERYONE must use CTT(so FFT and NFT have their own technodes, so they appear later in the game)

Everyone can use Kerbal Konstructs(NO LAUNCHING FROM IT, BUT CAN BE USED AS A RUNWAY/LANDING PAD)

KK runways cost 5000 ore(remove with hyperedit/drain valve, Either is fine

KK landing pads(LVL 1 launchpads) cost 4000 ore(again, delete it with hyperedit/drain valve)

EVERYONE may use Extraplanetary Launchpads IF they choose(because you will be going interstellar, Its fair game to use it)

EVERYONE must use USI LS

Goals

Launch something

Get to orbit

Land on the mun/minmus

Land on interplanetary object(planet/moon)

Plant a flag on interplanetry object

Construct a space station with at least 3 modules(must be launched SEPERATELY and docked in orbit)

Travel to another star system(can be a flyby)

Land on an exoplanet/moon and plant a flag

Construct a base on an exoplanet

Colonize at least 4 bodies in the star system(they need to be able to produce lifesupport, unless they import it from another moon in the same planetary system, NO COLONIES ON GAS GIANTS)

Colonize the star system FULLY(Nova Kirbani counts as 1 system btw)

Note, I must approve the mod before you can use it, e.g you cannot use KSPIE.
